title: Ketu Transit in the 5th House for Cancer Ascendant
summary: Ketu transiting your fifth house creates detachment from validation through creativity, romance, and recognition. You may feel less motivated to seek attention for talents or intellectual achievements, preferring quiet depth over display. Romantic expression becomes restrained, and emotional excitement reduces. This phase encourages maturity in decision-making, especially around speculation or expectations. When accepted consciously, Ketu here refines intelligence, removes ego from creativity, and supports wisdom rooted in inner clarity.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Reduced desire for praise or recognition.

sections.heading: Career
points: Creative work continues without need for spotlight.
Teaching, research, or analysis suits this phase.

closing: Ketu in the 5th house removes the need to impress. What remains is intelligence guided by wisdom rather than ego.
